constituent: plan, relax, house, woman, tree, wood
heisigStory: Without much effort, the elements relax . . . tree suggest a hammock strung between two trees in your backyard, and you stretched out in it, hands folded behind your head, planning something or other. After all, it's something we all do from time to time: kick up our legs on the nearest piece of furniture and daydream about the best plan of action to take. Be sure to relate the relaxation to the tree, so that you don't end up with something else in its place (like "legs" or "desk" or "table").
koohiiStory1: I plan to RELAX on top of that TREE.
koohiiStory2: If you bring a woman to your house, generally its not a good plan to stick your wood up her bottom, she may scream in pain あん!
myStory: kế hoạch. người phụ nữ lên kế hoạch trồng cây trong nhà
